title: ‘AI That Understands You’: Mark Zuckerberg Plans to Deepen AI’s Presence in Our Online Lives
full_text: ‘AI That Understands You’: Mark Zuckerberg Plans to Deepen AI’s Presence in Our Online Lives. "Glasses are the ultimate incarnation of this vision," he added.. Six months into its big AI turnaround, Meta believes 2026 will be the year it starts reaping the benefits. The tech giant has spent billions upon billions on Meta Superintelligence Labs, poaching to… [+4547 chars]
